para.text: A board of directors shall meet at least annually and may hold meetings inside or outside the District.

A board of directors may permit directors to attend or conduct board meetings through the use of any means of communication if all directors attending the meeting can communicate with each other during the meeting.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 811 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act. Edition
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 3(d) of Association Meeting Flexibility Emergency Amendment Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-6, Feb. 13, 2025, 72 DCR 1643).
